original_text: Now Nadab and Abihu, the sons of Aaron, each took his censer and put fire in it and laid incense on it and offered unauthorized fire before the Lord, which he had not commanded them.
korean_text: 아론의 아들 나답과 아비후가 각기 향로를 가져다가 여호와께서 명령하시지 아니하신 다른 불을 담아 여호와 앞에 분향하였더니

sentences.original_text: Now Nadab and Abihu, the sons of Aaron,
and offered unauthorized fire before the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와 앞에 명령하지 않은 불을 드렸는데,

sentences.original_text: which he had not commanded them.
